data.title: Power plant profile: Hebei XingTai Power Station, China
data.meta_description: Hebei XingTai Power Station is a 700MW coal fired power project. It is located in Hebei, China.
data.text:
Description

The project is currently owned by Hebei Construction and Investment Group.

It is a Steam Turbine with Cogen power plant.

The thermal power project consists of 2 turbines each with 350 MW nameplate capacity.

Development status

The project got commissioned in November 2016.

Contractors involved

SEPCOIII Electric Power Construction was selected to render engineering procurement construction services for the coal fired power project.

For more details on Hebei XingTai Power Station, buy the profile here.

This content was updated on 10 July 2024
